ValidationRule.description: Sales Reps cannot move any Opportunity backwards in Stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(StageName) && CASE(StageName, "00 - MQL",1, "0 - Identified Prospect Account",2, "1 - Account Exploration",3, "2 - Account Qualification",4,"3 - Consideration",5,"4 - Evaluation",6,"5 - Verbal Commit/LOI",7,"6 - Negotiations",8,"7-Execution",9,"Close Pending",10,"Closed Won",11,"Closed Lost",11, 0) < CASE(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"00 - MQL",1,"0 - Identified Prospect Account",2, "1 - Account Exploration",3,"2 - Account Qualification",4,"3 - Consideration",5,"4 - Evaluation",6,"5 - Verbal Commit/LOI",7,"6 - Negotiations",8,"7-Execution",9,"Close Pending",10,"Closed Won",11,"Closed Lost", 11, 0) && $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <> "PF Ops" && $Profile.Name <> "PF Super User"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your Profile does not have permission to move any Opportunity backwards in Stage.
